required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CDIAG Regimen in the Treatment of Relapsed or Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia
clinical_study.official_title: Chidamide, Decitabine Combined With Priming IAG Regimen in the Treatment of Relapsed or Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to investigate the therapeutic efficacy and side effect of chidamide, decitabine combined with priming IAG regimen for relapsed or refractroy acute myeloid leukemia

primary_outcome.description: Remission rate achieved after one-two couses induction therapy by CDIAG regimen
It is measured from the date of entry into this trial to the date of death from any cause; patients not known to have died at last follow-up are censored on the date they were last known to be alive.

secondary_outcome.description: Record of adverse events in hematological system during and after CDIAG regimen induction

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events in other organs or systems
secondary_outcome.description: Record of adverse events in other organs or systmes during and after CDIAG regimen induction

arm_group.description: Relapsed or refractroy acute myeloid leukemia patients reveive chidamide, decitabine combined with priming IAG regimen treatment.

intervention.description: Chidamide 30mg orally twice every week for 2 weeks on days 1, 4, 8, 11, decitabine 20mg/m2 intravenously daily for 5 days (d1-d5) and IAG regimen (cytarabine, 10 mg/m2 subcutaneously every 12 h on days 4-17; idarubicin, 5mg intravenously every other day on days 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14; and concurrent granulocyte colony-stimulating factor, 200mg/m2/day subcutaneously daily on days 3-17.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Relapsed or refractory acute myeloid leukemia patients without severe complications such as active infections and bleedings; ECOG score less than 3.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Inablity to tolerate inducton chemotherapy; life expectancy less than 1 month

facility.name: The First Affliated Hospital of Soochow University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University
